definition: نفل V and VIII to do more than is required by duty or obligation, to supererogate (specif., prayers, charity, or the like) نفل nafl supererogatory performance, specif., a work of supererogation نفل nafal pl. انفال anfāl, نفول nufūl, نفال nifāl booty, loot, spoil; present نفل nafal clover
